snippet: The Socialist Left Party accused the Nobel committee’s chairman, a longtime advocate of Norway joining the European Union, of playing politics by honoring the bloc.
lead_paragraph: The Socialist Left Party accused the Nobel committee’s chairman, a longtime advocate of Norway joining the European Union, of playing politics by honoring the bloc.

headline.seo: Some Norwegians Dismayed Over Nobel for Europe
headline.main: Some Norwegians Dismayed Over Nobel Peace Prize for European Union
headline.print_headline: Some Norwegians Dismayed Over Nobel Peace Prize for European Union
